name: Thought Box [Game Made Under 48 hours For Ludum Dare 48 Jam]
name_original: Thought Box [Game Made Under 48 hours For Ludum Dare 48 Jam]
description:
This game is a game jam entry for Ludum dare 48

In this game, you think deeply to find out your thinking ability...

You will learn how to focus on your thoughts.

And, How to think deeply with a better-focused metal state.
